General.Name: Exel Composites Oyj
General.Description: Exel Composites Oyj engages in the design, manufacture, and marketing of pultrusion, pull-winding, and continuous lamination composite solutions in Europe, the Asia Pacific, North America, and internationally. The company offers bus and coach, train and tram, truck and trailer, and automotive profiles for transportation applications; and window and door profiles, structural composites, sunshades, umbrellas, and awnings. It also provides composite solutions for frangible support structures, water and wastewater treatment systems, utility power transmission and distribution, rail solutions, and paper machines, as well as wind power, telecommunication, and machinery and electrical applications. In addition, the company offers composite solutions for defense applications, such as camouflage netting support telescoping poles, carbon fiber telescoping poles, and non-magnetic tool handles. Further, it provides textile machine solutions, insulating and non-ferrous composite solutions, and composite conduit rods for machinery and electrical industries. Additionally, the company offers standard and custom sized composite tubes, and laminates that are used in residential, commercial, and industrial applications. Exel Composites Oyj was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
